name: triton-extension-enabler
description: A Google Chrome Extension for the game Neptune's Pride (formerly Triton)

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/js && cp -r css/ dist/ && cp -r images/ dist/ && cp -r js/lib/ dist/js/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
